about_the_game:
This is the second volume of the "PixelScapes" series which is a pixel art style 3D model resource pack.
It includes 3D stamps for outdoor use, such as fantasy RPG-style houses and hero statues, and 3D stamps for indoor use to decorate traditional establishments such as bars and inns, allowing you to create town and village maps that inspire adventure for players.

[PixelScape Town Pack] Contents
3D Stamps: 124
- Private House: 18 (6 types, variation 12）
- Doors: 3 (1 type, variation 2）
- Chimneys: 2
- Outdoor Decorations: 31 (25 types, variation 6)
- Indoor Decorations: 57 (51 types, variation 6)
- Plants: 9 (variation 4)

Terrain: 158

Sample Maps: 7
detailed_description:
This is the second volume of the "PixelScapes" series which is a pixel art style 3D model resource pack.
It includes 3D stamps for outdoor use, such as fantasy RPG-style houses and hero statues, and 3D stamps for indoor use to decorate traditional establishments such as bars and inns, allowing you to create town and village maps that inspire adventure for players.

[PixelScape Town Pack] Contents
3D Stamps: 124
- Private House: 18 (6 types, variation 12）
- Doors: 3 (1 type, variation 2）
- Chimneys: 2
- Outdoor Decorations: 31 (25 types, variation 6)
- Indoor Decorations: 57 (51 types, variation 6)
- Plants: 9 (variation 4)

Terrain: 158

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Graphics: Graphic board that works with OpenGL 4.4 or higher
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Performance is not guaranteed under a virtual or emulated environment.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Core i5-8400 / Ryzen 5 1500X or better
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce™ GTX1650 AMD Radeon™ RX570
  • Additional Notes: Performance is not guaranteed under a virtual or emulated environment.

short_description: It contains 3D stamps for outdoor use, such as fantasy RPG-style houses and statues of heroes, as well as 3D stamps for indoor decoration of standard facilities such as taverns and inns, allowing players to create town and village maps that stir a sense of adventure.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
